Scripts.OnLoad: local x, y = self:GetSize() self.normalTexture:SetSize(x, y) self.highlightTexture:SetSize(x, y)

Scripts.OnEnter:
self:GetParent():LockHighlight()
local tooltipText = self:GetAttribute("tooltipText") local tooltip = tooltipText and _G[tooltipText] if tooltip then GlueTooltip:SetOwner(self) GlueTooltip:SetText(tooltip) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
Mixin(self, GlueDark_ButtonMixin, GlueEasingAnimMixin, CharSelectChangeRealmButtonMixin)
self:OnLoad() self:OnLoadStyle()

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.tooltip then GlueTooltip:SetOwner(self) GlueTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0) end
if self:IsEnabled() ~= 1 and not CharSelectServicesFlowFrame:IsShown() then GlueTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOM", 0, -10) GlueTooltip:SetText(CHARACTER_UNDELETE_NOT_CHARACTER) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if strupper(self:GetText()) == strupper(DELETE_CONFIRM_STRING) then self:GetParent().OKButton:Enable() else self:GetParent().OKButton:Disable() end
if strlenutf8(self:GetText()) > 1 then self:GetParent().OKButton:Enable() else self:GetParent().OKButton:Disable() end
